resources.string: Keep your screen off\n while your app is running

This app is a screen-saver for your phone. Prevent unnecessary touch inputs and save battery by drawing a screen-saver over the entire screen. This app also uses the proximity sensor to prevent screen-saver from unlocking inside your pocket.
After installation, add ScreenLock tile to the quick setting panel. Click the tile to activate a screen-saver and double tap screen to deactivate.
SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW - required to draw screen overlay\n WRITE_SETTINGS - required to change brightness settings
